t: Brand Owner Case Studies | Hope & Henry
s: Hope & Henry sells beautiful, high-quality, and affordable clothing using organic cotton and sharing profits with the women and men who sew them.
Hope & Henry was born from the belief that beautiful, high-quality clothing can be affordable for all without sacrificing the well-being of our people and our planet.
All HOPE brand products are Brazilian and developed for all women.
